---
title: "quarto remove"
---

## NAME

quarto remove - 

## SYNOPSIS

```bash
quarto remove [OPTIONS]
```

## DESCRIPTION

```

Usage:   quarto remove [target...]
Version: 1.8.26                   

Description:

  Removes an extension.

Options:

  -h, --help                   - Show this help.                                                           
  --no-prompt                  - Do not prompt to confirm actions                                          
  --embed       <extensionId>  - Remove this extension from within another extension (used when authoring  
                                 extensions).                                                              
  --log         <file>         - Path to log file                                                          
  --log-level   <level>        - Log level (debug, info, warning, error, critical)                         
  --log-format  <format>       - Log format (plain, json-stream)                                           
  --quiet                      - Suppress console output.                                                  
  --profile                    - Active project profile(s)                                                 

Commands:

  help  [command]  - Show this help or the help of a sub-command.

Examples:

  Remove extension using name: quarto remove <extension-name>
```
